traceClustering.FlaskImpl package¶

This package has dependencies to the main module in this project.

Submodules¶

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app module¶

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.about()¶
traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.allowed_log_file(filename)¶

checks if given file has correct type for log :param filename: name of the file to check :return: boolean: file has valid type

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.allowed_sample_file(filename)¶

checks if given file has correct type for sample :param filename: name of file to check :return: boolean: file has valid type

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.download_csv()¶

send cluster csv file as download GET ——-

:return cluster csv file

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.download_xes()¶

send clustered xes file as download GET ——-

:return clustered xes file

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.find_projects()¶

list all currently created (with a stored xes file) projects :returns

String of project names

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.find_samples(filename)¶

:returns

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.replaceSample(filename, newsample)¶

replace the oldest sample with the new one :param filename: :return:

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.signout()¶
traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.thresholds()¶

provide page to calculate thresholds and performs the clustering. For more information on the clustering algorithm refer to backend documentation.

perform clustering algorithm :return redirect to download page showing measurements and fsps

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.upload_log_file()¶

provides page to upload log if user already has project POST ——-

store file and :return redirect to upload sample page

traceClustering.FlaskImpl.app.upload_sample_file()¶

provides page to upload sample if user already has project

store file and :return redirect to select thresholds page
